alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 06 at 11:38AM EDT until August 09 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. .Another round of heavy rain is bringing quick rises to the Kentucky River this weekend. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...From this morning to early Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.7 feet just after midnight tonight. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. The next statement will be issued by 11 pm EDT.
